column1: Appendix table 22: Number of state and federal prisoners in local jail facilities, by jurisdiction, December 31, 2000, 2008, and 2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Appendix table 22. Number of state and federal prisoners in local jail facilities, by jurisdiction, December 31, 2000, 2008, and 2009

column3: Number of prisoners in local jail facilities

column1: a/Prisons and jails form one integrated system.
b/As of December 31, 2001, responsibility for sentenced felons from the District of Columbia was transferred to the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
c/Not comparable to previous years. As of 2009, the count includes all prisoners out to court.
